key.name: peer-endpoint
key.description: Remote endpoint in URI form (e.g. tcp://host:7100) that receives clipboard updates from this machine.

key.name: listen-port
key.description: Port to bind the built-in sync server that accepts remote clipboard updates.

key.name: shared-secret
key.description: Shared secret used to authenticate clipboard update requests. Requests with a mismatched secret are ignored.

key.name: poll-interval
key.description: Interval in seconds between remote clipboard fetch attempts. Set to 0 to disable polling and rely solely on push notifications.

key.name: sync-primary
key.description: Synchronize the primary selection (middle-click paste) in addition to the regular clipboard.

key.name: node-id
key.description: Automatically generated identifier for this machine. Leave empty to let the extension generate a new identifier on first run.
